product_name: Woolrich Acclimatize Rain Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Pack along the Woolrich Acclimatize jacket and you'll always be ready for a sudden downpour. Lightweight nylon shell features a waterproof, breathable laminate to keep the rain and snow at bay. All seams are sealed for weather-tight protection. Back of jacket features a mesh lined vent to expel warm air. Hood features drawstring adjustments for a perfect fit. Drawcord adjustable hem and snap cuffs dial down the fit and keep the elements out. Jacket and hand pockets feature lightweight water-resistant zippers; internal pocket stores a few essentials. Woolrich Acclimatize jacket is packable and includes a lightweight mesh storage bag. Fabric provides UPF 40 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Closeout.
short_description: Pack along the Woolrich Acclimatize jacket and you'll always be ready for a sudden downpour.
